name: NEON Woody plant survey data: ACCE DTP analytical subset
description: This data product, sourced from the NEON data portal for the purposes of the ACCE DTP tutorial, contains processed individual level data from measurements of woody individuals and shrub groups.Â

variableMeasured.name: uid
variableMeasured.description: Unique ID within NEON database; an identifier for the record

variableMeasured.name: named_location
variableMeasured.description: Name of the measurement location in the NEON database

variableMeasured.name: date
variableMeasured.description: Date or date and time of measurement, observation, or collection event

variableMeasured.name: event_id
variableMeasured.description: An identifier for the set of information associated with the event, which includes information about the place and time of the event

variableMeasured.name: domain_id
variableMeasured.description: Unique identifier of the NEON domain

variableMeasured.name: site_id
variableMeasured.description: NEON site code

variableMeasured.name: plot_id
variableMeasured.description: Plot identifier (NEON site code_XXX)

variableMeasured.name: individual_id
variableMeasured.description: Domain-level unique identifier for an individual: NEON.MOD.D##.######

variableMeasured.name: growth_form
variableMeasured.description: The growth form classification

variableMeasured.name: stem_diameter
variableMeasured.description: Cross-sectional stem diameter

variableMeasured.name: measurement_height
variableMeasured.description: Height at which stemDiameter is measured

variableMeasured.name: height
variableMeasured.description: Highest point of an individual or average height of a patch

variableMeasured.name: point_id
variableMeasured.description: Identifier for a point location

variableMeasured.name: stem_distance
variableMeasured.description: Horizontal distance from stem to pointID location

variableMeasured.name: stem_azimuth
variableMeasured.description: Azimuth relative to True North between stem and pointID location

variableMeasured.name: taxon_id
variableMeasured.description: Species code, based on one or more sources

variableMeasured.name: scientific_name
variableMeasured.description: Scientific name, associated with the taxonID. This is the name of the lowest level taxonomic rank that can be determined

variableMeasured.name: taxon_rank
variableMeasured.description: The lowest level taxonomic rank that can be determined for the individual or specimen

variableMeasured.name: plot_type
variableMeasured.description: NEON plot type in which sampling occurred: tower, distributed or gradient

variableMeasured.name: nlcd_class
variableMeasured.description: National Land Cover Database Vegetation Type Name

variableMeasured.name: decimal_latitude
variableMeasured.description: The geographic latitude (in decimal degrees, WGS84) of the geographic center of the reference area

variableMeasured.name: decimal_longitude
variableMeasured.description: The geographic longitude (in decimal degrees, WGS84) of the geographic center of the reference area

variableMeasured.name: geodetic_datum
variableMeasured.description: Model used to measure horizontal position on the earth

variableMeasured.name: easting
variableMeasured.description: Geographic coordinate specifying the east-west position of a point on the Earth's surface (Universal Transverse Mercator, UTM)

variableMeasured.name: northing
variableMeasured.description: Geographic coordinate specifying the north-south position of a point on the Earth's surface (Universal Transverse Mercator, UTM)

variableMeasured.name: utm_zone
variableMeasured.description: UTM zone

variableMeasured.name: elevation
variableMeasured.description: Elevation (in meters) above sea level

variableMeasured.name: elevation_uncertainty
variableMeasured.description: Uncertainty in elevation values (in meters)

variableMeasured.name: stem_lat
variableMeasured.description: The geographic latitude (in decimal degrees, WGS84) of individual plants

variableMeasured.name: stem_lon
variableMeasured.description: The geographic latitude (in decimal degrees, WGS84) of individual plants
